features: 🔥Premium Fireplace - This tabletop fire pit made of durable and non-toxic 304 stainless steel for at least several years uses and KORNIFUL offers a 1-year replacement. Designed with solid steel base and tempered glass panel which assembled without tools, just add fuel and ignite to get a dancing flame.

🔥Portable & Multi-Use - This portable fire pit with a windshield weighs about 4 pounds and you can take it anywhere to enjoy the flames whether it's indoors or outdoors. 220ml of fuel burns for almost 1 hour with with no ash, soot, or smoke.
🔥Amazing Gift for Family - Kids can use this tabletop fire pit to roast marshmallows/flames, youth can use it to create a romantic atmosphere, and adults can use it as a festival/party decoration.
🔥Great Home Decor - With it's unique design, this firepit makes the perfect modern home and outdoor decor clearance for your living room coffee table, dining room, patio, balcony, or front porch.

🔥Creating Coziness - This table top fire pit can create a better vibe than candles, watching the flame flicker and dance is an instant mood booster, and soul soother. Helps create a more relaxed atmosphere in a variety of settings such as living rooms, bedrooms, date nights, family nights, and party talking.
🔥Fuel Recommendation - Bioethanol, Isopropyl alcohol or rubbing alcohol, which give a nicer and more visible flame than ethanol.(No fuel included in the package)
🔥Safety First - The KORNIFUL fire pit will come with a detailed instruction manual that will guide you, or you can contact our 24h customer service to address your doubts and concerns.
body.description: KORNIFUL Indoor/Outdoor Tabletop Fireplace for Every Family Have a Charming Evening! This tabletop fireplace provides a smokeless and odorless flame experience, it creates a more cozy and comfortable sense of atmosphere than candles, allowing you to enjoy a wonderful evening! It let you enjoy having warmth and calming ambiance at your living room, bedroom, patio table or dinner table. Giving you that relaxing and healthy atmosphere that you deserve. Tips： It can also be used for Smores, and roasted marshmallows will definitely be a favorite with the kids. It's a wonderful idea to light a tabletop fire pit on the table when entertaining friends, which is much more advanced than a candle-lit dinner. It's sophisticated and elegant enough to use at almost any party or gathering, Halloween, St. Valentine's Day, weekend night, family night, New Year's Eve. All in all, this is a great gift for every family, whether it's a birthday, wedding, housewarming, baby shower, Thanksgiving, Christmas, this tabletop fire pit is a good choice, no need to think much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We originally got this for a white elephant gift and made sure we won it! We are so glad we did, as it is the perfect table top fire for romantic dinners or even in the living room while watching Netflix. We don’t have a fireplace and while electric fireplaces are nice, having this open flame is perfect! Gives off good warmth and makes a room feel cozy. Highly recommend using 70% isopropyl alcohol, which will last over an hour for just under 1 cup worth (~210ml). Price is perfect for the quality you get. 10/10 recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cute and efficient! Easy to put together and to extinguish

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars S’more S’more Please!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for a Christmas party and ended up using it for 3 other parties after its debut! Simple set up- elegantly diverse. Used mostly for S’more making but it definitely was a huge hit! I thought i would taste the alcohol that was used for the flame but not at all. Perfect tabletop decor-flame manageable and plexiglass sides gave a sense of safety for kids using them. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It creates a nice ambience. I use it in my family room. It does burn fast . I use 90 % alcohol. It burns fast but its cheap. No regrets .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just love that this thing uses rubbing alcohol for its fuel source! Really neat to be able to have a real fire (safely) indoor with zero smell or fumes. Really creates a pretty atmosphere in the evenings when I’m trying to just relax. Love it so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't expecting much from this inexpensive little table-top firepit, but it turned out to be really nice! For the price, you just can't beat it.Although it doesn't put out a ton of heat, you can definitely feel it, and it looks nice too; we have it out on our screened patio, and while we use our large LP firepit when we have company, this little one is nice for everyday use. It's great to use for the cooler nights we have here in the desert, giving off just enough heat to take the chill off.I'm using 70% rubbing alcohol for fuel, and it seems to work just fine. I read other reviews that said it didn't burn very long, but mine was still going strong after 1-1/2 hrs, till I extinguished it with the tamper tool that came with it.My only (small) complaint is that the directions weren't very good. I wasn't sure how much fuel to put in (all the way to the top?) and if the wick should be sticking up out of the fuel.... But I filled it all the way and pulled up an edge of the wick to light it, and that seemed to work well. Also, it would have been nice if it came with a couple extra wicks; I'm not sure how long they last, but the refills for it cost more than the unit did!All-in-all, a fun little firepit and good value for the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Look great, short burn time
reviews.reviewText: Look great. Easy to use. Filled completely, but still had to refill twice in one party.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fire is fun
reviews.reviewText: This is a fun fire thing. A couple of things to keep in mind:-Roasting marshmallows with this is not the same as doing it over a campfire and coals. They catch on fire easily and quickly if you are not careful.- Once you fill it and light it, you are only supposed to use it until the fluid is gone or you decide to put it out. You are not supposed to add more fluid until you put it out and let it cool down. You could cause a disaster if you try and add fluid while it is hot or lit. So you can't keep it running continuously.- We used 91% isopropyl alcohol and filled it to the max fill line. It burned for over 40 min before we put it out. There were 6 or 7 of us sitting at the table and this was in the center. It was noticeably warm/hot.
¡Me encantó!Llegó en tiempo y muy bien embalada en su caja, sin embargo no le doy 5 estrellas ya que la tapita que sofoca el fuego llegó desoldada, por lo demás bastante satisfecha, la recomiendo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not bad - beware when buying a white fire pit
reviews.reviewText: I really liked the look of the fire pit it's so elegant. But because I bought the white one it took no time for it to turn black after burning. Also, I have read other reviews who say they can get an hour burning time, I feel like I get 15 to 20 minutes of burning time. If anyone has any suggestions please let me know. I tried to upload a photo but this app is not allowing me to. Flames are great - gives off a nice warm heat. My suggestion would be to buy a black fire pit otherwise you'll have issues scrubbing the black off each time

Alguna vez utilizé chimeneas de Ethanol en unas cabañas y calentaron la habitacion muy bien, Pero esta en particular no solucionó el problema, Me imagino que es muy pequeña, Mas bien funciona como decoracion
